content.en: Automated Neural Configuration: Researchers are exploring ways to automate the configuration of neural networks using algorithms called neural architecture search (NAS). These algorithms aim to reduce the need for manual trial-and-error in setting up neural networks. By studying automated machine learning (AutoML) and NAS, scientists are working towards building high-quality deep learning systems without human assistance. They are also investigating methods to improve the efficiency and scalability of NAS, as well as incorporating techniques like self-supervised learning and optimization-inspired design to achieve better performance.
content.da: Automatiseret Neural Konfiguration: Forskere undersøger måder at automatisere konfigurationen af neurale netværk ved hjælp af algoritmer kaldet neural architecture search (NAS). Disse algoritmer har til formål at reducere behovet for manuel prøven og fejlen ved opsætning af neurale netværk. Ved at studere automatiseret maskinlæring (AutoML) og NAS arbejder videnskabsfolk på at bygge høj-kvalitets dyb læringssystemer uden menneskelig assistance. De undersøger også metoder til at forbedre effektiviteten og skalerbarheden af NAS samt integrerer teknikker som selv-superviseret læring og optimerings-inspireret design for at opnå bedre ydeevne.
